commitResults.messageTitle: Add Company field and filter by company feature
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add Company model class with validation
- Update Person class to include company field
- Update AddCommand to support optional company parameter (c/)
- Update EditCommand to support editing company
- Add FilterCompanyCommand to filter contacts by company
- Add FilterCompanyCommandParser for parsing filter command
- Update storage layer (JsonAdaptedPerson) to persist company
- Update UI to display company information
- Update all sample data with company examples
- Update all related tests and test utilities
- All 267 tests pass

New commands:
- add ... c/COMPANY - add person with company
- edit INDEX c/COMPANY - edit person's company
- filtercompany COMPANY_NAME - filter by company

commitResults.messageTitle: Add comprehensive tests for Company field feature
Remove FilterCompanyCommand to reduce command count
commitResults.messageBody:
- Remove FilterCompanyCommand and related parser
- Remove CompanyContainsPredicate
- Remove all related tests
- Unregister command from AddressBookParser

Rationale:
- Team prefers fewer commands
- Company search will be integrated into find command in future PR
- This PR focuses on adding Company field infrastructure only

Core Company field functionality retained:
- Company model class
- Add/Edit command support for company (c/ prefix)
- Storage and UI support
- All tests pass (267 tests)
Add company field to organize contacts by company

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: extend Meeting model with completion status and notes
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add isCompleted boolean field (defaults to false)
- Add notes String field with validation
- Add defensive programming with assertions and validation
- Update constructors to support new fields
- Update equals(), hashCode(), and toString() methods
- Maintain backward compatibility with default constructor

This enables tracking meeting completion status and storing
meeting notes for future mark command functionality.

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: add meeting history to Person model
commitResults.messageBody:
- Replace NextMeeting field with List<Meeting> meetings field
- Add methods to get next upcoming meeting, completed meetings, and upcoming meetings
- Add backward compatibility constructor for NextMeeting
- Update equals(), hashCode(), and toString() methods
- Add defensive programming with assertions and null checks
- Update PersonCard, EditCommand, and JsonAdaptedPerson for compatibility

This enables tracking meeting history for future mark command functionality
while maintaining backward compatibility with existing NextMeeting usage.
